name: overreaction
content:

Add to word list
the action of reacting in an extreme, especially an angry or frightened, way: She accused police of a massive overreaction. The pollen causes an overreaction in the human immune system. See
overreact
More examplesFewer examplesThe newspaper accused everyone of hysterical overreaction.This chronic disease is characterized by an overreaction of the immune system to protein substances.The ban is an absurd overreaction to a problem that can be solved with simple measures.
